thoughts.text: Now that I have gathered information on Qalam wa Lawh's programs, I should use the 'list_files' command to see what files are in my workspace directory.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the 'list_files' command will help me see what files are in my workspace directory and make sure I am organized.

- Organize my notes and make sure they are up-to-date
- Decide on a course or destination to pursue first
